metadata.name: Create Presentation Plan
metadata.shortDescription: Create comprehensive presentation plan based on requirements for PowerPoint generation or live presentation delivery
metadata.description: Professional presentation planning tool that creates structured presentation plans suitable for both reading-only documents and live presentation delivery. Automatically calculates slide counts, provides template-based organization, and ensures content accuracy based on source materials.
objectives: Create structured presentation plans with logical flow and professional organization
Calculate optimal slide counts based on presentation type and duration requirements
Provide template-based content organization for consistent presentation development
Support multi-language presentation planning (English, French, Spanish, German)
Generate presentation plans ready for PowerPoint automation or manual content creation
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

prompts.name: create-presentation-plan
prompts.description: Main prompt for creating structured presentation plans with slide count calculation
